pr_title: Unexpected wait cost between access and transit

timeline.message: Remove 'arriveBy' from search parameters. We might add a arrive/departure preference later, but it is more likely to be an enum than a boolean flag. This is a user preference that affect the pareto-set (function), but it does not affect the search in any other way(reverse/forward).
Code cleanup, refactor by renaming LifeCycleBuilder to LifeCycleSubscriptions, and inline debugRequest in SearchContext.
Unexpected cost added for the wait time between access and transit with RangeRaptor (#2927)
Unexpected cost added for the wait time between access and transit with RangeRaptor (#2927)

timeline.bodyText: I took away this, it is no longer in use.
timeline.author: t2gran
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,22 @@
+package org.opentripplanner.transit.raptor.api.request;
+
+/**
+ * TODO OTP2 - Write doc if implemented
+ */
+public enum ArrivalAndDeparturePreference {
+    /**
+     * Find the best results within the time window. The traveler is flexible within the
+     * search window. This is the default.
+     */
+    TIME_TABLE,
+
+    /**
+     * The traveler prefer to arrive as early as possible given the earliest departure time.
+     */
+    ARRIVE_EARLY,
+
+    /**
+     * The traveler prefer to depart as late as possible given the latest arrival time.
+     */
